response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This represents an incredible opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $12,000 to you, at a price that is only slightly above its cost to me. I am confident this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 11500}
